pullrequest.title: IMAQdxCamera: Use smart programming to avoid unnecessary setting of attributes.

content.raw: Technically the class attribute isn't necessary because the subclass could override `initialise_GUI`, call the base class method, and then call `supports_smart_programming` again to override the behaviour of the base class. But that's more lines of code, and probably poor programming \(it only works because of how that method is written\)! Just thought I’d mention it as a possibility.
content.html: Technically the class attribute isn't necessary because the subclass could override initialise_GUI, call the base class method, and then call supports_smart_programming again to override the behaviour of the base class. But that's more lines of code, and probably poor programming (it only works because of how that method is written)! Just thought I’d mention it as a possibility.
